headline: Datadog, Inc. (DDOG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Datadog, Inc. on Rijnberk InvestInsights’s Substack by Daan | InvestInsights. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DDOG. Datadog, Inc.’s share was trading at $136.68 as of August 29th. DDOG’s trailing and forward P/E were 379.67 and 74.63 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Datadog (DDOG) has quietly […]

headline: Citigroup Boosts Datadog (DDOG) Target; AI Growth Drives Hedge Fund Interest
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the best tech stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On August 18, Citigroup maintained its Buy rating on Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG), while increasing its price target from $165 to $170. The company generated $826.76 million in revenue in Q2 2025, a 28.1% growth year-over-year. This stellar growth was driven […]

headline: Cathie Wood Predicts That AI Will Create a $13 Trillion Software Opportunity. This Stock Could Be Unstoppable If She's Right.
summary: Innovative cloud company Datadog is perfectly positioned to benefit as more businesses adopt artificial intelligence software.
